Title: Requires uniform criteria for evaluation and selection of grants and loans by the New York state industrial development agency
Summary: Relates to loans and grants by industrial development agencies; requires uniform criteria for evaluation and selection of an eligible entity for a loan; defines terms; outlines such criteria.
LawCode: Amd ยง858, add ยง859-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the powers of industrial development agencies and certain loans and grants to eligible entities
